name: Lahu Outpost Trekking Experience in Chiangmai
description:
Meeting at Lisu Lodge, Mae Taeng, Chiang Mai. We are starting the trekking
in a jungle trail to the remote
village of Hmong Pha Mieng. Meet the inhabitants of this small hill tribe
village in the jungle. Enjoy a picnic lunch in the forest and overnight at the Lahu Village of Kup Kap.
